title: Pistachio macaroons
ingredients: ['Macaroons', '30g unsalted pistachios, finely chopped', '125g ground almonds', '205g icing sugar', '100g egg whites', '20 drops green food colouring', 'Pistachio ganache', '100ml creme fraiche or single cream', '40g unsalted pistachios', '40g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon vanilla sugar', '2 egg yolks', '20g butter, softened', '5 drops black food colouring']
